        Block until storage volume state changes to the given value
        Parameters:
        volume - Storage volume. (:type volume: :class:`StorageVolume`)
        state - The target state to wait for (:type state: ``int``)
        wait_period - How many seconds to between each loop iteration (default is 3) (:type wait_period: ``int``)
        timeout - How many seconds to wait before timing out (default is 1200) (:type timeout: ``int``)

        `StorageVolume`
